alert.note: Alert for Bryce Canyon Country; Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; Sevier Valley; South Central Utah; Upper Sevier River Valleys; Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 13 at 3:55PM MST until December 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM TUESDAY TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches around Bryce Canyon National Park, and 1 to 3 inches elsewhere. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Sevier Valley, Zion National Park, Upper Sevier River Valleys, Bryce Canyon Country, South Central Utah and Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity. * WHEN...From 11 PM Tuesday to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
